Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: WinXP
Operating System :: Other Operating Systems :: Microsoft Windows Server 2003

name: RadioNET Lite
short_description:
You can listen to internet radio in high quality with RadioNET Lite, don't need to worry about disk space and performance, The program requires half the resources of RadioNET.

The program downloads our "official playlist" on start, so you get a list of stations instantly

If program does not start, install one of these .NET frameworks:

If using Windows 2000 or slowest XP ever: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=1639

Don't know if it works on Windows ME with any .NET/service pack, but I will be thankful if you say so in the sourceforge page.

if using WinXP: Pretty sure every newer version than 2.0 will make the program start,
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=1639 will work too
You can run the program from 4.0 to, but if you have 4.0, what's the point getting Lite version?
Anyway... http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851
